entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lucky Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lucky Lake 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
